short_desc: Offers DUI (Driving Under the Influence) programs for offenders
description: Offers different DUI programs. Each program is licensed by the State of California, and meets the requirements set forth by the California Department of Alcohol and Drug Programs and the California DMV. Provides information about alcohol and drug dependency, the addiction process, DUI laws, and strategies to prevent more offenses. Upon completion of selected course, gives paperwork to provide to court. Upon completion of all requirements and payments, submits completion certificate to California DMV.Courses are offered in English, Cantonese, Mandarin, Vietnamese, Korean and Russian.
